shortdesc.ph: Stops or resumes publishing the local audio stream.
Stops or resumes publishing the local audio stream.
Stops or resumes publishing the local audio stream.
Stops or resumes publishing the local audio stream.

section.p: This method controls whether to publish the locally captured audio stream. If the local audio stream is not published, the audio capture device is not disabled, so the audio capture state is not affected.

This method controls whether to publish the locally captured audio stream. Not publishing the local audio stream does not disable the audio capturing device, so it does not affect the audio capture status.

This method controls whether to publish the locally captured audio stream. Not publishing the local audio stream does not disable the audio capture device, so it does not affect the audio capture status.

This method controls whether to publish the locally captured audio stream. Not publishing the local audio stream does not disable the audio capture device, so it does not affect the audio capture status.

section.title: Timing
section.p: Can be called before or after joining a channel.
Can be called before or after joining a channel.
Can be called before or after joining a channel.
Can be called before or after joining the channel.

section.title: Related Callbacks
section.p: After this method is successfully called, the local client triggers the callback; the remote client triggers the and callbacks.
After this method is successfully called, the local user triggers the callback; the remote user triggers the and callbacks.
After this method is called successfully, the local user receives the callback; remote users receive the and callbacks.
After this method is successfully called, the local user triggers the callback; remote users trigger the and callbacks.

plentry.pd:
Whether to stop publishing the local audio stream.
: Stop publishing.
: (Default) Publish.

Whether to stop publishing the local audio stream.
: Stop publishing.
: (Default) Publish.

: Stop publishing.
: (Default) Publish.

Whether to stop publishing the local audio stream.
: Stop publishing.
: (Default) Publish.

section.title: Return Values

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.

ul.li: < 0: Failure. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
